artist: Painter: After Rosalba Carriera; Engraver: Bernard Lépicié; Publisher: Michel Odieuvre
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in image on pedestal in black: Rosa Alba Pinx   B. Lépicié sculp / ROSA ALBA CARRIERA / de l'Académie Royal de Peinture / Né à Venise | below image in black: 7 Paris Chez Odieuvre M'd. d' Estampes es quay del 'ecole vis-a-vis le côté acla  armaritt ala belle Image cll(?)I   | on sheet in pencil: 2-321
title: Rosa Alba Carriera
